content: पेयूषः --षं {@--1@} Nectar. {@--2@} The milk of a cow that has calved within seven days; सप्तरात्रप्रसूतायाः क्षीरं पेयूषमुच्यते <ls>Hārāvalī</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Fresh ghee.
पेयूषः --षं {@--1@} Nectar. {@--2@} The milk of a cow that has calved within seven days; सप्तरात्रप्रसूतायाः क्षीरं पेयूषमुच्यते <ls>Hārāvalī</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Fresh ghee.
